variables.desc: The Nintendo DS (NDS) is a dual-screen handheld game console developed and released by Nintendo. It was Nintendo's third handheld game console, following the Game Boy Advance. The NDS was notable for its innovative dual-screen design, which featured a touch screen and a microphone. It also had a wide library of games, including many popular titles such as Mario Kart DS and The Legend of Zelda: Phantom Hourglass.
